landing.title: Amharic Screenplay Writing Tool
landing.hero_description: A specialized tool designed for Ethiopian screenwriters to draft, collaborate, and format scripts in Amharic.
landing.hero_caption: Bridging the gap in digital tools for Amharic storytelling.
landing.features_description: Our tool provides comprehensive support for scriptwriting, collaboration, and formatting in Amharic.
landing.card1_description: Full support for Amharic script with proper text placing and formatting.
landing.card1_content: Seamless input, editing, and display of Amharic text with proper character encoding and font support.
landing.card2_description: Work together with other writers and track changes efficiently.
landing.card2_content: Comment on scripts, invite collaborators, track edit history, and manage versions.
landing.card3_description: Pre-designed templates for Ethiopian storytelling types.
landing.card3_content: Choose from various templates tailored to different storytelling styles and types common in Ethiopian cinema.
landing.card4_description: Professional screenplay formatting with industry standards.
landing.card4_content: Tools to manage content placement, scene numbering, character dialogues, and other screenplay elements.
landing.card5_content: Export scripts to custom extensions or common formats like PDF, ensuring compatibility with other tools.
landing.card6_description: Schedule main events with the help of an automatic tracking system.
landing.card6_content: Create a scheduling calendar to manage events and tasks with the help of an auto-tracking system, enabling efficient production management.
landing.card7_description: Easily track and manage all characters in your script.
landing.card7_content: This tool automatically extracts and organizes a list of all characters appearing in your script, helping you maintain consistency. Writers can use this list to establish character relationships, track interactions, and manage conflicts, ensuring a well-structured and engaging story.
landing.cta_description: Join us in bridging the gap in creative technology for local storytellers.

about.title: About Us
about.description: The Amharic Screenplay Writing Tool is a modern, intuitive platform tailored for Ethiopian storytellers. Our mission is to empower writers with the tools they need to draft, collaborate, and produce scripts in their native language.
about.vision_body: We envision a creative ecosystem where Ethiopian screenwriters have access to world-class digital tools that respect and support Amharic culture and storytelling formats.
about.why_body: The lack of tools for writing and formatting Amharic screenplays has limited creativity. Our tool addresses this gap with native Amharic support and production features.
about.features_body: From character extraction to production scheduling and collaboration, our tool provides everything you need to go from idea to final script — in one place.
about.who_body: Independent writers, film schools, production studios, and anyone passionate about storytelling in Amharic.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: We'd love to hear from you. Whether you're a writer, director, educator, or enthusiast — drop us a message!

services.title: Our Services
services.description: Our platform is tailored for Ethiopian screenwriters, offering powerful tools to write, collaborate, format, and manage screenplays in Amharic.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.body: Invite co-writers, share comments, track edits, and manage revisions seamlessly in a collaborative environment.

templates.title: Script Templates
templates.body: Templates designed for Ethiopian storytelling, drama structures, and cinematic formatting.

formatting.title: Professional Formatting
formatting.body: Automatically handle scene headers, dialogue blocks, actions, and transitions according to screenwriting norms.

io.title: Import/Export Options
io.desc: Work with different file types easily.
io.body: Export to PDF or Word, and import content from other editors to continue your script without formatting issues.

production.title: Production Tools
production.body: Manage your production timeline with scheduling tools for casting, shooting dates, and location planning.

characters.title: Character Management
characters.desc: Track every character in your script.
characters.body: Extract characters automatically and use the character list to track dialogue, relationships, and roles.
